image.title: Hair-whipping
image.caption: Dance Marathon contestants tossed their hair to a rousing song at 4 p.m., Saturday.

image.title: UNC v. Boston College
image.caption: The UNC-Boston College basketball game was projected in both rooms.

image.title: Look alive
image.caption: DM contestants kept the energy alive on Saturday afternoon.

image.title: The small things in life
image.caption: A dancer massaged her foot late Saturday afternoon.

image.title: Tar Heel born, Tar Heel bred
image.caption: DM contestants screamed at the start of the UNC-Boston College basketball game.

image.title: Taking a break
image.caption: A group of dancers took a short break to rest on the wall.

image.title: Barnes battle
image.caption: Contestants enjoyed free ice cream refreshments Saturday afternoon.

image.title: What a dunk
image.caption: The lights went off in the gym to better see the basketball game, leaving the room lit by just a disco ball and the light from the screens.

image.title: Strickland breakaway
image.caption: DM contestants kept the energy alive on Saturday evening.

image.caption: DM contestants took a break Saturday evening.
